method.name: Fuzzy Edited Nearest Neighbor classifier

reference.ref: M. Yang and C. Cheng, On the edited fuzzy k-nearest neighbor rule, IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics Part B: Cybernetics, vol. 28, no. 3, pp. 461-466, 1998.

generalDescription.howWork: FENN is the Fuzzy version of on Wilson's editing rule for k-NN, ENN: All instances in the training set are checked and those whose classification by the FuzzyKNN rule does not agree with its original class are removed.

parameterSpec.param: K Value: K parameter in the k-NN voting rule.
K Edition: K value used in the ENN rule.
K Init: K value used in the initialization process.

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: FENN-C Dataset: appendicitis Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: Default settings
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the Vis-Clas-Check results' file the classification results for the test set:
TEST RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.9090909090909091 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.8181818181818181 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.9090909090909091 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.9 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.9 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.9 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.12090909090909092 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.09064051235148023 Correctly classified: 0.879090909090909 Global N/C: 0.0
TRAIN RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Summary of data, Classifiers: appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.8947368421052632 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.8736842105263158 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.8947368421052632 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.8736842105263158 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=0.8631578947368421 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.9052631578947369 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.8645833333333334 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.875 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.875 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=0.8645833333333334 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.12155701754385964 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.013918028833982885 Correctly classified: 0.8784429824561404 Global N/C: 0.0
